text: Arau arasye itipurbe tomalokara ocarata suspasta pramanadisaha i'uchupha ahichila, phalata te'om tomalokara ocarata yi lai ahichila se'itora prati tomaloke sadaya sandeha karaichila. Arasesata yetiya te'omra mrtyu ha’la tetiya tomaloke kaichila, ‘allahe e'omra pichata ketiya'o ana kono raachula praerana nakaraiba.’ E'idarae'i allahe pratyeka simalanghanakarai, sansayabadika bibhraanta karae
